key_risks: Privacy and data protection concerns due to tracking technology and unclear user consent
Moderation challenges leading to racial profiling, misinformation, and toxic behavior
Legal risks from class action lawsuits and potential violations of privacy laws
Financial instability due to heavy reliance on local business advertising revenue
Market and competitive pressures from other social media platforms and local community apps
controversies: Scrutiny over data collection practices and potential privacy law violations
Inadequate moderation leading to racial profiling and misinformation during COVID-19
Class action lawsuit alleging misleading statements and failure to disclose material information
social_issues: Racial profiling and toxic behavior on the platform
Struggles with managing medical misinformation during the COVID-19 pandemic
governance_issues: Legal liabilities from class action lawsuits and privacy law violations
Challenges in maintaining effective content moderation policies
